The team at IPXcore has been doing Internet services since 2003 as Digital Design Core. We moved into the VPS market in May of 2011 as IPXcore. We started this because we were on a BurstNET node that kept getting oversold, and we were unable to get any form of support. We decided that we could do better.

All of our nodes are located in the ColoCrossing Data Center in New York. We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell and HP Opteron-powered hardware. All nodes are on 100 megabit.
